We can't actually, as lit'l only deals with 'internal' app routes. That is, the router doesn't know anything about the location.origin, the full URL, etc. The router state object only gives us app-relevant data (you're on this Component on this route at the path /whatever/cool).
Do you have any suggestions on stubbing out the window object? In the past, I've used something like window-or-global for a similar case, but not sure if it would work here. I'm open to suggestions.
